description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2b, line 16. Physical description: 21 lines per page; written in miniscule naskh in black on beige glazed, laid Arabic and European papers. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Extensive damp staining on first half of manuscript, but text still legible. Origin: According to Mach, 16th century. Incipit: اللهم اني احمدك حمدا لا يقدر حصره ... اما بعد فان الالتفات الى علم اصول الفقه
author: Aʻraj, ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Muḥammad, 1282-1353?
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillīʼs Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl; incomplete at end.
extent: 53 leaves : paper ; 202 x 133 (153 x 90) mm bound to 207 x 138 mm
title: Munyat al-labīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb.
provenance: Large, partially smudged owner's stamp of al-Ḥājj Aḥmad on leaf 2a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: اعرج، عبد المطلب بن محمد، 1282-1353?
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
binding note: Rebound in quarter leather with cloth covers.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
